text: Norberto James Rawlings (February 6, 1945 – January 7, 2021) was a Dominican Republic poet. His poetry was about the everyday life in his country’s multicultural society. His first book of poetry from 1969, "Sobre la marcha" ("On the March").«"James J. Davis: Entrevista con el dominicano Norberto James Rawlings" Consultado el 2 de diciembre de 2016. ==Works== * Sobre la marcha (1969) * La provincia sublevada (1972) * Vivir (1981) * Hago constar (1983) * Obras 1969-2000 (2000) * Poesía 1969-2000 (2011) * Poesía completa, 2020 (2020) == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== ==Other websites== * "Poesía" * “Los inmigrantes” Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dominican Republic writers Category:North American poets
title: Norberto James Rawlings
